TABLE.NAME: seal
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the seal activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: idcoursecertify
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of certify attestated

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_admin
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the principal entity that certify.

TABLE.NAME: seal_course_certify
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores wiht course enabled for use certify.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of certify

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: certify used before

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_course_political
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the political certify activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: idcoursecertify
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of certify attestated

FIELD.NAME: typepolitical
FIELD.COMMENT: type political: 1,completly course. 2,quiz. 3,other certify 4,manual for teacher

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: coursevalue
FIELD.COMMENT: value optional

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: quizvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: minimal value of quiz.

FIELD.NAME: manualteacher
FIELD.COMMENT: value manual teacher

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_user
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the user activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.
